      • getApplicationID

        public java.lang.String getApplicationID()
        The application id of the application. The rcpclient application should have a unique application id of its own. The method should be overridden by the sub class. By default, it returns null.
        Returns:
        application id.

      • getApplicationTitle

        public java.lang.String getApplicationTitle()
        The method to get the application title. The method should be overridden by the sub class. By default, it returns null.
        Returns:
        application title

      • getApplicationImageTheme

        public java.lang.String getApplicationImageTheme()
        The method to get the theme to dispaly the application image. The method should be overridden by the sub class. By default, it returns null.
        Returns:
        theme used to dispaly the application image.

      • getModuleID

        public java.lang.String getModuleID()
        The method to get the module id of the application. The method should be overridden by the sub class. By default, it returns null.
        Returns:
        module id of the application.

      • isEnterpriseRequiredForAuthorization

        public boolean isEnterpriseRequiredForAuthorization()
        returns whether an enterprise is required for authorization during login.
        Returns:
        a boolean value of true or false depending on whether an enterprise is required for authorization during login.

      • isNodeRequiredForAuthorization

        public boolean isNodeRequiredForAuthorization()
        returns whether a node is required for authorization during login.
